ing: 1 (3.4 ounce) package butterscotch instant pudding mix
1/2 cup sour apple schnapps (such as DeKuyperÂ® Sour Apple Pucker Â®)
2 tablespoons butterscotch schnapps (such as DeKuyperÂ® ButtershotsÂ®)
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping (such as Cool WhipÂ®), thawed
des: "Super fun and unusual treat for cookouts! Freeze pudding shots until ready to serve."
ins: Beat milk and pudding mix together in a bowl until smooth; add apple schnapps, butterscotch schnapps, and vodka and stir until blended. Fold whipped topping into pudding mixture until incorporated. Spoon the pudding mixture into shot glasses or disposable 'party shot' cups.
